code: import React from'react';import'./Pagination.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Pagination=_ref=>{let{pageObj,requestQuery}=_ref;if(!pageObj||!pageObj.is_paginated){return null;}const renderPageLinks=()=>{const links=[];const queryParam=requestQuery?"&q=".concat(requestQuery):'';if(pageObj.has_previous){links.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"?page=".concat(pageObj.previous_page_number).concat(queryParam),children:"Previous"},"previous"));}for(let i=0;i<pageObj.paginator.num_pages;i++){const pageNum=i+1;if(pageObj.number===pageNum){links.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"current",children:pageNum},pageNum));}else{links.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"?page=".concat(pageNum).concat(queryParam),children:pageNum},pageNum));}}if(pageObj.has_next){links.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"?page=".concat(pageObj.next_page_number).concat(queryParam),children:"Next"},"next"));}return links;};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"pagination",children:renderPageLinks()});};export default Pagination;
